basic.description: This course will examine a variety of topics, including equations of motion, mass conservation, thermodynamics, vorticity, and geostrophic, gradient and thermal winds.
basic.subject: MET
basic.title: Introduction to Atmospheric Dynamics

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: MAC 2312 ("C-" or better), PHY 2048C ("C-" or better), and MET 2700 ("C" or better).
